title: Center the selected button label text

requirements.text: Update ONLY the selected element at XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[5]/button[1]/div[1]/span[1]` so that it is visually centered within the app layout (center-aligned within its available width). Apply styling changes only to this `<span>` (e.g., make it full-width and center its text) without moving, resizing, or restyling other elements.

quotes: bring it to center of the app

acceptanceCriteria: The text inside the selected `<span>` renders centered (not left-aligned) in its current UI context.
The change is applied only to the selected `<span>` element; no other layout/spacing changes occur elsewhere on the page.

constraints: Apply the user instruction ONLY to the element selected by the provided XPath.
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not redesign the surrounding section, button, or page layout beyond centering the selected spanâ€™s content.
Do not add new features or change routing/navigation.
